title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Von Miller, Packers Insider Tyler Dunne, Brady Return Game Pick
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Von Miller, Packers Insider Tyler Dunne, Brady Return Game Pick
description:
The best of this week's Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes, including his reaction to the Rams dominant performance against Brady and the Bucs, why Tom Brady is thriving in his post-Belichick divorce life, and his surprise team of the young NFL season (2:00).

Then, Super Bowl MVP and 8-time Pro Bowler Von Miller explains why rookie corner Patrick Surtain II is unlike any other rookie he's ever seen, reveals how the "No Fly Zone" defense knew they would dominate Cam Newton and the Panthers in Super Bowl 50, and the surprising answer to which offensive lineman has given him the most problems (20:00). Next, Packers Insider Tyler Dunne weighs in on this Green Bay team's surprising strength, and their biggest weakness (30:00). And finally, Action Network CCO Chad Millman tells Colin the sharp play in Brady's hyped return to face Belichick and the Pats in Foxboro on Sunday Night (37:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
